value:
Spring... A season that calms the
heart with the gentle touch of a
breeze...

In the spring, my thoughts are always
drawn home... The cherry blossoms
of Hoshido bloom magnificently.

For a ninja, stealth is essential. But
clothing like this... It does not help.

While this clothing does interfere with
my ability to maintain focus...$k$pI'm told that it's not so unusual in
other realms. So, really, there is no
need to let it become a distraction.

Look at this springtime picture I drew.
A hellscape, you say? Er...$k$pI appreciate that you consider it
imaginative, but it really isn't. This...
is simply my homeland in spring.

I bring springtime greetings from
$Nf.
I blossom like a bloom in spring.
My time to blossom draws near...
I am still a bud.

Spring has burst into flower. I am
grateful for this.

You sensed my presence, didn't you?
The spring breeze makes it difficult to
remain concealed.$k$pI am Kagero, a ninja. I am pleased to
make your acquaintance.

Spring is beautiful no matter where
you find yourself...$k$pI hope I can capture even a small part
of this beauty on paper.$k$pCherry blossoms, flowers in bud,
gently thawing streams...$k$pSpring dazzles us with the pulse of
life begun anew.$k$pAnd if I had never come here, to you,
I could never have seen this
springtime scenery.$k$pThank you for guiding me to this
place. Please continue to guide me.$k$pWe have chosen to spend this lovely
day together. I hope that I can keep
spending times like these with you.
せやっ！
いやっ！
うああっ！
Horrible...
I will survive.
Spring is here...
Let us celebrate spring!
Ninjabbit attack!
How shameful...
ふふ
I am Kagero. This outfit is strange, I know. It's for the spring festival.
Hey! What do you think you're doing?
When at a festival, it is only correct to observe local custom. That's why I'm dressed like this, you see.
As a ninja, I'm not used to being seen. But you may look, if you like. I have nothing to be ashamed of.
You think this outfit suits me? It's...a little flimsier than what I'm used to.
No matter how I may be dressed, I carry the honor of my clan with me. Always.
If you have no objections to this attire, then I would continue to serve at your side.
Of course.
As petals fall...
Spring into action.
